title: Partial stab at MoinMoin XML-RPC interface
summary: Uploaded a partial stab at XmlRpcToWiki for MoinMoin. Have to figure out how to map enumerated versions to MoinMoin's style of diffs, have to update all the implementations with a few changes to the API spec in general. But, I just wanted to get some things out there, even if they're in progress.
content: Uploaded a partial stab at XmlRpcToWiki for MoinMoin.
